titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation for the better quieting the Post-Master General in the execution of his office and for his future encouragement therein.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Whitehall, the 25th day of May, 1663, in the fifteenth year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard Library.
